name: Quinn Allman
introduction: Quinn Allmanthe used 吉他手身高：178cm（我瞬间幻灭，一直目测他180+的）性别：男宗教：有时候会被误认为是摩门教。不过在2003年的雅虎音乐采访中Allman称，由于我的父母不是摩门教徒，所以我允许咒骂，但我不会对身边的人的爆粗口。学历：高中毕业我一直关心的婚姻状况￣ c￣：2011年与美国偶像第八季选手Megan Joy订婚（Megan育有一子），他们会在九月结婚。(cry me a river。。老泪纵横T/~~\T）quinn从the used乐队成立第一天起就是一份子，那时他才十五岁。参加过的电影原声：2007 变形金刚（歌曲Pretty Handsome Awkward）2007 纪录片：朋克不死（歌曲Listening）2005 电锯惊魂2（歌曲Sound Effects and Overdramatics）参与电影：2009 The Used Artwork（视频拍摄）2007 纪录片：朋克不死（出演自己）2004视频： Punk Rock Holocaust（出演自己）quinn用的一些吉他、效果器和其他设备等：Gibson SG faded (with Alnico 5 pick-up in the bridge)Gibson SG StandardFender '72 Telecaster DeluxeSchecter guitars (oo6, PT, omen 6...)Schecter Tempest guitars (gold one, black 12 string)Gibson les paul standard 1950's reissueGibson ’79 Les Paul CustomGibson Les Paul Gold Top with P-90s (mainly for recording)Amps and Cabinets- Orange Rocker 30 head- Orange PPC412 cabsNote: He mainly only is playing Orange live now- Marshall Heads (DSL100, ’78 JMP head, Vintage Modern heads...)Marshall 1960B straight-front, checkerboard cloth, 4x12 celestion speakersSoldano head (recording)- Mesa Dual Rectifier (used in the past)- Bad Cat Amps/Pedals? (According to the Bad Cat site at least...)Effects and More- Boss PS-3 Pitch Shifter- modified Boss Super overdrive SD-1 (made by Drew Foppe)Boss PS-5 Super ShifterBoss NS-2Boss TU-2 TunerLine 6 fb4- Line 6 MM4 Modulation Modeler
